faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about using Mister Imot Platform

question1.question: How can I find new apartments or houses in my city?
question1.answer: Open the map at https://mrimot.com/listings and explore projects in your city. Each project is posted by a verified developer, not a broker. You can view location details, visit sites in person, and contact developers directly. No registration is required to browse and explore all listings.

question2.question: Are the projects on the platform reliable?
question2.answer: Every project is posted by a verified developer. Developers are accountable for the accuracy of their listing details. Our verification confirms the developer identity, ensuring you can trust the source while connecting directly with legitimate builders without middlemen.

question3.question: What does it cost to list a project?
question3.answer: We offer one transparent plan: â‚¬39/month per listing (excluding VAT) with monthly billing or â‚¬29/month per listing (excluding VAT) with annual billing. You pay only for the number of active listings you use (from 1 to 10). For over 10 listings, we offer a custom Enterprise plan with preferential pricing.

question4.question: Do I need to register to browse listings?
question4.answer: No registration is required. You can search, explore, and view all projects completely open.

question5.question: Does it cost money for buyers to use the platform?
question5.answer: Browsing listings, checking project details, and contacting developers directly is 100% free. Buyers can explore all verified developer projects without any fees, advertisements, or hidden costs.

question6.question: What does it take to get verified as a developer?
question6.answer: Our team manually verifies developers through direct contact via phone or email. The process confirms your identity and role in the project, ensuring only genuine developers can post listings and that buyers see authentic sources.

question7.question: Are only developers allowed on the platform?
question7.answer: Yes. Only verified real estate developers can post projects. Brokers or third parties are not allowed unless explicitly authorized by the developer, ensuring a trustworthy platform for buyers.

question8.question: How long does verification take?
question8.answer: Verification is usually completed within 48 hours. We prioritize speed while ensuring accuracy, so developers can post projects quickly and buyers can access verified listings reliably.

question9.question: How do I post a project after verification?
question9.answer:
After verification, developers gain access to a management dashboard from which they can publish their projects. In this article you will find detailed instructions and video guidance:
https://mrimot.com/news/how-to-add-listing-guide

If needed, the Mister Imot team is available to assist with publishing and managing listings.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Mister Imot's mission to revolutionize real estate in Bulgaria through verified developers and transparent property listings.

aboutMisterImot.title: What is Mister Imot?
aboutMisterImot.description: Mister Imot is a platform created with a vision to modernize the new construction market in Bulgaria and make it transparent, direct, and accessible.
aboutMisterImot.point1: We connect buyers directly with investors and builders â€” without brokers, hidden commissions, or fake listings.
aboutMisterImot.point2: We verify the builders and investors who publish their projects.
aboutMisterImot.point3: Each of them is responsible for the accuracy of their listings, and our team monitors and responds to user reports to maintain a high level of trust and quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create the most reliable and modern ecosystem for new construction in Bulgaria.
mission.point1: We work daily to improve the platform, listen to users, and implement their ideas.
mission.point2: We invest in technology, security, and marketing, because we believe that good projects deserve real visibility.
mission.goal: Our goal is clear â€” to become the largest platform for new construction in Bulgaria and one of the leaders on a global scale.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.description: Manage your subscription and watch for special offers
billing.freeUntilDescription: You have free and unlimited access until 01.02.2026. Youâ€™ll receive a special offer here and via email soon.
billing.specialDealTitle: Stay tuned for your special deal
billing.specialDealDescription: Make the most of the platform during the free period.
billing.specialDealHighlight: Keep building â€” your listings and data remain active during the free period.
billing.builtForBulgarian: Built specifically for Bulgarian developers and investors.
billing.qualifiedLeadsDesc: Get inquiries from real buyers searching for new construction and direct contact with you â€” no wasted traffic.
billing.exclusiveListingsDesc: Only you can publish your project. Your media stays protected and cannot be re-uploaded by others.
billing.noBrokersDesc: Save on broker commissions with direct-to-buyer conversations.
billing.payOnlyWhatYouUse: Pay only for what you use. You have a fixed number of active listings; when a project sells out or you swap it, just replace it â€” no extra fee for a new active listing.
billing.step1: Choose how many active project listings you want
billing.step2: Pay monthly for your active project listings
billing.step3: Swap active listings anytime as your needs change
billing.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees, no long-term contracts
billing.noPlanAfterDate: What if I have no active plan after 01.02.2026?
billing.noPlanAfterDateAnswer: If you donâ€™t have an active plan after 01.02.2026, your listings will not be active or public.
billing.reuploadNeeded: Do I need to re-upload my listings after the free period?
billing.reuploadNeededAnswer: No. Choose a plan to keep them public.
billing.switchPlansAnswer: You can upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes apply from the next billing cycle.
billing.howPerListingWorks: How does the per-listing model work?
billing.howPerListingWorksAnswer: You pay monthly for each active listing and can change which listing is active at any time.
billing.isThereContractAnswer: No long-term contracts. Pay monthly and cancel anytime.
billing.paymentMethodAnswer: Payments are online via Stripe. Invoices are sent by email.

terms.projectOwnerDescription: This platform is a personal MVP project developed and maintained by an individual (referred to as "we", "us", "our").

terms.provideSpace: We provide a space for developers to list their new construction projects.
terms.noIntermediary: We do not act as an intermediary, agent, or broker and take no responsibility for the accuracy of listings, communications between users, or any transactions or agreements made outside the platform.

terms.authorized: Authorized to provide information on behalf of such a company.
terms.manualVerification: We perform manual verification (via phone or in person) to ensure that listed companies are legitimate real estate developers.
terms.useInAccordance: Use the platform in accordance with applicable laws
terms.refrainFromAbuse: Refrain from abuse, spam, or unauthorized automation
terms.reserveRight: We reserve the right to suspend or delete any account without notice, especially in case of:
terms.noWarranties: We make no warranties about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the content or listings.
terms.notLiable: We are not liable for any losses, damages, or disputes arising from the use of this platform.
terms.mayBeUpdated: These Terms may be updated at any time. Continued use of the platform implies acceptance of the current Terms.
terms.copyright: Â© 2025 Mister Imot. All rights reserved. | Part of Prodigy Corp
